Description: Rest on the flight to Egypt; the Holy Family in a landscape; the Virgin sits with Child underneath a tree, Joseph stands with donkey to the left; they are surrounded by numerous putti, one of whom blows a trumpet, with an attached banner, containing the Saxon shields; with stains. 1509 Woodcut
Producer name: Print made by: Lucas Cranach the Elder
Curator's comments: Cf. D. Koepplin / T. Falk, Lucas Cranach: Gemälde - Zeichnungen - Graphik, 2 vols, exh. cat. Kunstmuseum Basel, 1974, no. 375. Later than the chiaroscuro impression, registered as 1834-7-12-57.
Bibliographic references: Hollstein / German engravings, etchings and woodcuts c.1400-1700 (7)
Dodgson 1903, 1911 / Catalogue of Early German and Flemish Woodcuts in the BM, 2 vols (II.295.58.a)
